skills.name: Armor Corrosive
skills.description: Reduces an enemies physical defense for two turns.

skills.name: HP Thief
skills.description: Attacks one enemy twice with a dagger. Attacker gains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

skills.name: Share SP
skills.description: Give 50% of your current SP to another party member.

skills.name: Steal
skills.description: Steal one item from one enemy.

skills.name: Steal SP
skills.description: Attack a single enemy twice with a dagger. Attacker gains SP equal to 5% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Wildfire
skills.description: Deal massive fire-element damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Aeber’s Reckoning
skills.description: Attack all enemies with a dagger. Damage dealt is proportional to the user’s speed stat.

skills.name: Bewildering Grace
skills.description: Causes a random effect to happen once.

skills.name: Lion Dance
skills.description: Raises a party member’s physical attack stat for two turns.

skills.name: Mole Dance
skills.description: Boost a party member’s physical defense for two turns.

skills.name: Moonlight Waltz
skills.description: Deals massive dark-elemental damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Night Ode
skills.description: Deals dark-elemental damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Panther Dance
skills.description: Boosts a party member’s speed for two turns.

skills.name: Peacock Strut
skills.description: Boost a party member’s elemental attacks for two turns.

skills.name: Sealticge’s Seduction
skills.description: Target party member’s skills that usually target one enemy will target all for three turns.
